item.title: Top Wall Street analysts suggest these 3 dividend stocks for enhanced total returns
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service highlights three dividend-paying stocks, including Valero Energy and Albertsons Companies.

item.title: Warren Buffett shuns stock buybacks even as Berkshire lags the market. Here's why
item.description: Berkshire's shares continue to trade in line with their intrinsic value, leaving little incentive for stock repurchases.

item.title: Earnings playbook: AMD and Palantir set to report in another busy week
item.description: About 130 S&P 500 companies are scheduled to release their latest financials over the next five days.

item.title: Impactive Capital sees a structural shift creating upside for this wastewater company
item.description: Impactive Capital recently took a stake in Advanced Drainage Systems and sees earnings growth ahead that is under appreciated.

item.title: Caterpillar is among the most overbought stocks on Wall Street after a post-earnings surge. Here are the others
item.description: Wall Street's most oversold stocks this week include Chipotle Mexican Grill and Fiserv.
